name: bathroom

item_setup_dict.mirror: There is a BATHROOM MIRROR above the sink set in the NORTH wall and
item_setup_dict.waste basket: a WASTE BASKET against the EAST wall.

long_description: You look around the bathroom quickly.  It is a large room with a tub big enough for two or three people, but it is a bathroom nevertheless.  The white tile reflects what little light it catches and makes the room easy to look around.  You notice the BATHROOM MIRROR set in the NORTH wall and a WASTE BASKET against the EAST wall.  The door in the WEST wall leads back to the MAIN BEDROOM.

room_list.narrative_text: The door in the $$direction wall leads back to the $$room_name.
